sentences.en: An examination of these global differences in living standards is revealing.
sentences.cn: 考察一下全球生活水平的这些差异,颇有意义.

sentences.en: He suddenly smiled, revealing teeth that had recently been capped.
sentences.cn: 他突然笑了出来，露出了刚箍过的牙。

sentences.en: He thanked God for concealing Himself from the wise and revealing Himself to the simple.
sentences.cn: 他感谢上帝，因为上帝在自作聪明的人面前自行隐匿，在心地纯洁的人面前则显现神迹。

sentences.en: He was averse to revealing the sources of his information.
sentences.cn: 他不乐意透露消息的来源.

sentences.en: His reticences are more revealing than his speech.
sentences.cn: 他的沉默所表露的胜过他的言词.

sentences.en: His toupee dropped off, revealing his bald head.
sentences.cn: 他的假发掉了，露出了光头。

sentences.en: I don't think that revealing your past to your boyfriend scared him off.
sentences.cn: 我并不认为是因为你把自己的过去向男朋友坦白才把他吓跑的。

sentences.en: Just as revealing are Mr Johnson'sportraits, of which there are dozens.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊先生的肖像画同样发人深省，而这样的画有很多。

sentences.en: Respect the local etiquete. Modest clothing is often preferable to revealing shorts and tight-fitting tops.
sentences.cn: 要尊重当地的礼节。朴素端庄的衣着往往比暴露的短裤和紧身上衣更合适。

sentences.en: She was wearing a tight and revealing gold dress.
sentences.cn: 她身穿一件暴露的金色紧身连衣裙。

sentences.en: The book is very revealing about young people's views of themselves.
sentences.cn: 这本书深刻揭示了年轻人对自己的看法.

sentences.en: The man smiled, revealing perfect white teeth.
sentences.cn: 那个男人微笑着, 露出雪白整齐的牙齿.

sentences.en: The saboteurs had demanded money in return for revealing how they hacked into the systems.
sentences.cn: 那些故意破坏者索要钱财，以作为透露自己是如何非法进入该电脑系统的交换条件。

sentences.en: They scooped the other newspapers by revealing the matter.
sentences.cn: 他们抢先报道了这件事.

sentences.en: You could do yourself a grave disservice by revealing all to a potential rival.
sentences.cn: 将一切都透露给潜在的竞争对手只会给自己帮倒忙。

phrases.tran_cn: 显示全部（计算机操作命令）

trans.tran_cn: 有启示作用的，给人启发的，透露真情的，袒胸露肩的
trans.tran_en: revealing clothes allow parts of your body to be seen which are usually kept covered
